roleset.name: to push quickly and forcibly

example.name: resultative
example.text: [*] Perhaps most exciting , the device is thrusting open a window to the workings of the brain .
example.arg: a window to the workings of the brain

example.name: all arguments
example.text: It more than doubled Federal 's long-term debt to $ 1.9 billion [*U*] , thrust the company into unknown territory -- heavy cargo -- and suddenly expanded its landing rights to 21 countries from four .
